And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, Depart<S>3212</S>, and go up<S>5927</S> hence, thou and the people<S>5971</S> which thou hast brought up<S>5927</S> out of the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, unto the land<S>776</S> which I sware<S>7650</S> unto Abraham<S>85</S>, to Isaac<S>3327</S>, and to Jacob<S>3290</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Unto thy seed<S>2233</S> will I give<S>5414</S> it:
And I will send<S>7971</S> an angel<S>4397</S> before<S>6440</S> thee; and I will drive out<S>1644</S> the Canaanite<S>3669</S>, the Amorite<S>567</S>, and the Hittite<S>2850</S>, and the Perizzite<S>6522</S>, the Hivite<S>2340</S>, and the Jebusite<S>2983</S>:
Unto a land<S>776</S> flowing<S>2100</S> with milk<S>2461</S> and honey<S>1706</S>: for I will not go up<S>5927</S> in the midst<S>7130</S> of thee; for thou art a stiffnecked<S>7186</S> <S>6203</S> people<S>5971</S>: lest I consume<S>3615</S> thee in the way<S>1870</S>.
And when the people<S>5971</S> heard<S>8085</S> these evil<S>7451</S> tidings<S>1697</S>, they mourned<S>56</S>: and no man<S>376</S> did put<S>7896</S> on him his ornaments<S>5716</S>.
For the LORD<S>3068</S> had said<S>559</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, Say<S>559</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, Ye are a stiffnecked<S>7186</S> <S>6203</S> people<S>5971</S>: I will come up<S>5927</S> into the midst<S>7130</S> of thee in a<S>259</S> moment<S>7281</S>, and consume<S>3615</S> thee: therefore now put off<S>3381</S> thy ornaments<S>5716</S> from thee, that I may know<S>3045</S> what to do<S>6213</S> unto thee.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> stripped<S>5337</S> themselves of their ornaments<S>5716</S> by the mount<S>2022</S> Horeb<S>2722</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> took<S>3947</S> the tabernacle<S>168</S>, and pitched<S>5186</S> it without<S>2351</S> the camp<S>4264</S>, afar off<S>7368</S> from the camp<S>4264</S>, and called<S>7121</S> it the Tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>. And it came to pass, that every one which sought<S>1245</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> went out<S>3318</S> unto the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, which was without<S>2351</S> the camp<S>4264</S>.
And it came to pass, when Moses<S>4872</S> went out<S>3318</S> unto the tabernacle<S>168</S>, that all the people<S>5971</S> rose up<S>6965</S>, and stood<S>5324</S> every man<S>376</S> at his tent<S>168</S> door<S>6607</S>, and looked<S>5027</S> after<S>310</S> Moses<S>4872</S>, until he was gone<S>935</S> into the tabernacle<S>168</S>.
And it came to pass, as Moses<S>4872</S> entered<S>935</S> into the tabernacle<S>168</S>, the cloudy<S>6051</S> pillar<S>5982</S> descended<S>3381</S>, and stood<S>5975</S> at the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S>, and the LORD talked<S>1696</S> with Moses<S>4872</S>.
And all the people<S>5971</S> saw<S>7200</S> the cloudy<S>6051</S> pillar<S>5982</S> stand<S>5975</S> at the tabernacle<S>168</S> door<S>6607</S>: and all the people<S>5971</S> rose up<S>6965</S> and worshipped<S>7812</S>, every man<S>376</S> in his tent<S>168</S> door<S>6607</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S> face<S>6440</S> to face<S>6440</S>, as a man<S>376</S> speaketh<S>1696</S> unto his friend<S>7453</S>. And he turned again<S>7725</S> into the camp<S>4264</S>: but his servant<S>8334</S> Joshua<S>3091</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Nun<S>5126</S>, a young man<S>5288</S>, departed<S>4185</S> not out<S>8432</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> said<S>559</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, See<S>7200</S>, thou sayest<S>559</S> unto me, Bring up<S>5927</S> this people<S>5971</S>: and thou hast not let me know<S>3045</S> whom thou wilt send<S>7971</S> with me. Yet thou hast said<S>559</S>, I know<S>3045</S> thee by name<S>8034</S>, and thou hast also found<S>4672</S> grace<S>2580</S> in my sight<S>5869</S>.
Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found<S>4672</S> grace<S>2580</S> in thy sight<S>5869</S>, shew<S>3045</S> me now thy way<S>1870</S>, that I may know<S>3045</S> thee, that I may find<S>4672</S> grace<S>2580</S> in thy sight<S>5869</S>: and consider<S>7200</S> that this nation<S>1471</S> is thy people<S>5971</S>.
And he said<S>559</S>, My presence<S>6440</S> shall go<S>3212</S> with thee, and I will give thee rest<S>5117</S>.
And he said<S>559</S> unto him, If thy presence<S>6440</S> go<S>1980</S> not with me, carry us not up<S>5927</S> hence.
For wherein shall it be known<S>3045</S> here<S>645</S> that I and thy people<S>5971</S> have found<S>4672</S> grace<S>2580</S> in thy sight<S>5869</S>? is it not in that thou goest<S>3212</S> with us? so shall we be separated<S>6395</S>, I and thy people<S>5971</S>, from all the people<S>5971</S> that are upon the face<S>6440</S> of the earth<S>127</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, I will do<S>6213</S> this thing<S>1697</S> also that thou hast spoken<S>1696</S>: for thou hast found<S>4672</S> grace<S>2580</S> in my sight<S>5869</S>, and I know<S>3045</S> thee by name<S>8034</S>.
And he said<S>559</S>, I beseech thee<S>4994</S>, shew<S>7200</S> me thy glory<S>3519</S>.
And he said<S>559</S>, I will make all my goodness<S>2898</S> pass<S>5674</S> before thee, and I will proclaim<S>7121</S> the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> before<S>6440</S> thee; and will be gracious<S>2603</S> to whom I will be gracious<S>2603</S>, and will shew mercy<S>7355</S> on whom I will shew mercy<S>7355</S>.
And he said<S>559</S>, Thou canst<S>3201</S> not see<S>7200</S> my face<S>6440</S>: for there shall no man<S>120</S> see<S>7200</S> me, and live<S>2425</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S>, Behold, there is a place<S>4725</S> by me, and thou shalt stand<S>5324</S> upon a rock<S>6697</S>:
And it shall come to pass, while my glory<S>3519</S> passeth by<S>5674</S>, that I will put<S>7760</S> thee in a clift<S>5366</S> of the rock<S>6697</S>, and will cover<S>5526</S> thee with my hand<S>3709</S> while<S>5704</S> I pass by<S>5674</S>:
And I will take<S>5493</S> away mine hand<S>3709</S>, and thou shalt see<S>7200</S> my back parts<S>268</S>: but my face<S>6440</S> shall not be seen<S>7200</S>.
